## NS.getServerUsedRam() method

Get the used RAM on a server.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getServerUsedRam(host: string): number;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type   | Description                    |
| --------- | ------ | ------------------------------ |
| host      | string | Hostname of the target server. |

<b>Returns:</b>

number

used ram

## Remarks

RAM cost: 0.05 GB
